metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0852 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple integer underflows in PluginPCX.cpp in FreeImage 3.17.0 and earlier allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap memory corruption) via vectors related to the height and width of a window. It was discovered that FreeImage incorrectly handled certain PCX files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
